newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Sept raw sugar imports down 19.2 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Japan Sept raw sugar imports down 19.2 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Japan's raw sugar imports in September totalled 101,952 tonnes, down 19.2 percent from a year earlier, Finance Ministry data released on Tuesday showed.
The breakdown was as follows (in tonnes):
Cumulative imports in the first nine months of this year totalled 1,147,742 tonnes against 1,210,642 tonnes during the same period last year.
